argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_nfrab1 | |- F/_ x { x e. A | T. } |
| 2 |  | #P_nfcv | |- F/_ x A |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_cleqf | |- ( { x e. A | T. } = A <-> A. x ( x e. { x e. A | T. } <-> x e. A ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_tru | |- T. |
| 5 |  | #P_rabid | |- ( x e. { x e. A | T. } <-> ( x e. A /\ T. ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_mpbiran2 | |- ( x e. { x e. A | T. } <-> x e. A ) |
| 7 | 3, 6 | #P_mpgbir | |- { x e. A | T. } = A |
\
 Alternate proof of ~ bj-rabtr .  (Contributed by BJ, 22-Apr-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
